foreignData.flavorText: 「人类婚礼上会撒米粒、放白鸽？真奇怪。」

foreignData.text:
飞行

每当你派出一个血滴衍生物时，若你操控五个或更多血滴衍生物，则转化沃达连血育师。
foreignData.type: 生物 — 吸血鬼／法术师

foreignData.flavorText: « Les humains lancent du riz et lâchent des colombes lors de leurs mariages ? Comme c'est pittoresque. »
foreignData.name: Magesang Voldaren // Invocatrice d'hémochiroptères
foreignData.text:
Vol
À chaque fois que la Magesang Voldaren ou une autre créature non-jeton que vous contrôlez meurt, créez un jeton Sang. (C'est un artefact avec « {1}, {T}, défaussez-vous d'une carte, sacrifiez cet artefact : Piochez une carte. »)
À chaque fois que vous créez un jeton Sang, si vous contrôlez au moins cinq jetons Sang, transformez la Magesang Voldaren.

foreignData.flavorText: „Die Menschen werfen auf ihren Hochzeiten Reis und lassen Tauben frei? Wie goldig."
foreignData.name: Voldaren-Blutmagierin // Blutsauger-Beschwörerin
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn die Voldaren-Blutmagierin oder eine andere Nichtspielsteinkreatur, die du kontrollierst, stirbt, erzeuge einen Blut-Spielstein. (Er ist ein Artefakt mit „{1}, {T}, wirf eine Karte ab, opfere dieses Artefakt: Ziehe eine Karte.")
Immer wenn du einen Blut-Spielstein erzeugst und falls du fünf oder mehr Blut-Spielsteine kontrollierst, transformiere die Voldaren-Blutmagierin.

foreignData.flavorText: "Gli umani lanciano riso e liberano colombe per i loro matrimoni? Che usanza pittoresca."
foreignData.name: Sanguinomante Voldaren // Evocatrice di Sanguinistrelli
foreignData.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta la Sanguinomante Voldaren o un'altra creatura non pedina che controlli muore, crea una pedina Sangue. (È un artefatto con "{1}, {T}, Scarta una carta, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Pesca una carta".)
Ogniqualvolta crei una pedina Sangue, se controlli cinque o più pedine Sangue, trasforma la Sanguinomante Voldaren.

foreignData.faceName: ヴォルダーレンの投血士
foreignData.flavorText: 「人間って結婚式でお米を投げて鳩を飛ばすの？変わってるわねぇ。」

あなたが血・トークン１つを生成するたび、あなたが５つ以上の血・トークンをコントロールしている場合、ヴォルダーレンの投血士を変身させる。

foreignData.flavorText: "Os humanos jogam arroz e soltam pombas nos casamentos? Que estranho."

foreignData.flavorText: «Люди на своих свадьбах бросают рис и выпускают голубей? Как оригинально».

Каждый раз, когда вы создаете фишку Крови, если под вашим контролем есть пять или больше фишек Крови, трансформируйте Волдаренскую Кровопускательницу.

foreignData.flavorText: "¿Los humanos tiran arroz y sueltan palomas en sus bodas? Qué curioso".

foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que la Conjurasangre de Voldaren u otra criatura que no sea ficha que controlas muera, crea una ficha de Sangre. (Es un artefacto con "{1}, {T}, descartar una carta, sacrificar este artefacto: Roba una carta".)
Siempre que crees una ficha de Sangre, si controlas cinco o más fichas de Sangre, transforma a la Conjurasangre de Voldaren.

mainBoard.name: Voldaren Bloodcaster // Bloodbat Summoner
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Whenever Voldaren Bloodcaster or another nontoken creature you control dies, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Whenever you create a Blood token, if you control five or more Blood tokens, transform Voldaren Bloodcaster.

rulings.text: Blood tokens that become Bats with Bloodbat Summoner’s ability are still Blood artifact tokens and still have “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.”
If an effect refers to a Blood token, it means any artifact token with the subtype Blood, even if it has gained other subtypes.
Some triggered abilities trigger "whenever you sacrifice a Blood token." These abilities trigger regardless of why you sacrificed that Blood token.

Voldaren Bloodcaster’s last ability checks how many Blood tokens you have both as it triggers and as it resolves. If you don’t control at least five Blood tokens at both of those times, it won’t transform.
You can't sacrifice a Blood token to pay multiple costs.

mainBoard.text:
Flying

Whenever you create a Blood token, if you control five or more Blood tokens, transform this creature.

mainBoard.name: Florian, Voldaren Scion
mainBoard.originalText:
First strike
At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the total amount of life your opponents lost this turn. Exile one of those cards and put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You may play the exiled card this turn.

rulings.text: Damage dealt to a player causes that player to lose that much life.

Florian's ability checks only how much life opponents lost during the turn, not by how much their life totals decreased compared to the start of the turn. For example, if an opponent lost 2 life and then gained 8 life before Florian's ability resolves, you'll look at the top two cards of your library.
If an opponent loses life and subsequently loses the game before your postcombat main phase, Florian's last ability counts that loss of life.
If an opponent loses life but Florian leaves the battlefield before your postcombat main phase begins, its last ability doesn't trigger.
If you somehow have more than two main phases in a turn, each main phase after your first one is a postcombat main phase, and Florian's last ability triggers at the beginning of each of them.
You get a postcombat main phase even if no creatures attacked during a turn. Florian's last ability will trigger.
You must pay all costs and follow all timing rules for cards you play with Florian's last ability.

mainBoard.name: Immersturm Predator
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Whenever Immersturm Predator becomes tapped, exile up to one target card from a graveyard and put a +1/+1 counter on Immersturm Predator.
Sacrifice another creature: Immersturm Predator gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

rulings.text: For the triggered ability to trigger, Immersturm Predator has to actually change from untapped to tapped. If an effect attempts to tap it while it is already tapped, the ability won't trigger.
Immersturm Predator's triggered ability doesn't allow you to tap Immersturm Predator. You have to find some other way to tap it. Let us suggest attacking.
You can activate Immersturm Predator's last ability even if it's already tapped.

You don't have to choose a target for Immersturm Predator's triggered ability. However, if you do choose a target and that card is an illegal target as the ability tries to resolve, the ability won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. In that case, you won't put a +1/+1 counter on Immersturm Predator.

rulings.text: A modal double-faced card can’t be transformed or be put onto the battlefield transformed. Ignore any instruction to transform a modal double-faced card or to put one onto the battlefield transformed.
If an effect allows you to play a land or cast a spell from among a group of cards, you may play or cast a modal double-faced card with any face that fits the criteria of that effect.

If an effect allows you to play a specific modal double-faced card, you may cast it as a spell or play it as a land, as determined by which face you choose to play. If an effect allows you to cast (rather than “play”) a specific modal double-faced card, you can’t play it as a land.

If an effect instructs a player to choose a card name, the name of either face may be chosen. If that effect or a linked ability refers to a spell with the chosen name being cast and/or a land with the chosen name being played, it considers only the chosen name, not the other face’s name.
If an effect puts a double-faced card onto the battlefield, it enters with its front face up. If that front face can’t be put onto the battlefield, it doesn’t enter the battlefield.

In the Commander variant, a double-faced card’s color identity is determined by the mana costs and mana symbols in the rules text of both faces combined. If either face has a color indicator or basic land type, those are also considered.

The mana value of a modal double-faced card is based on the characteristics of the face that’s being considered. On the stack and battlefield, consider whichever face is up. In all other zones, consider only the front face. This is different than how the mana value of a transforming double-faced card is determined.
There is a single triangle icon in the top left corner of the front face. There is a double triangle icon in the top left corner of the back face.
To determine whether it is legal to play a modal double-faced card, consider only the characteristics of the face you’re playing and ignore the other face’s characteristics.

rulings.text: A Vampire spell is a spell with the creature type Vampire on its type line, regardless of whether the word "Vampire" is in its name.
If an effect refers to a Blood token, it means any artifact token with the subtype Blood, even if it has gained other subtypes.
Some triggered abilities trigger "whenever you sacrifice a Blood token." These abilities trigger regardless of why you sacrificed that Blood token.

rulings.text: If Den of the Bugbear enters the battlefield at the same time as one or more other lands, it doesn't take those lands into consideration when determining how many other lands you control.

If Den of the Bugbear's last ability is activated multiple times in one turn, it will have multiple instances of the triggered ability that it grants. For example, if you activate it twice and attack, you will create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.
If you turn Den of the Bugbear into a creature but haven't controlled it continuously since your most recent turn began, you won't be able to activate its mana ability or attack with it.

選擇一項～
‧風化侵蝕對目標生物造成3點傷害。
‧消滅目標神器。

foreignData.flavorText: Le progéniteur Falkenrath était un vicieux fauconnier, et la lignée ne manque pas de rappeler son héritage aux autres.
foreignData.name: Fissuration
foreignData.text:
Choisissez l'un —
• La Fissuration inflige 3 blessures à une créature ciblée.
• Détruisez un artefact ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText: Der Falkenrath-Stammvater war ein bösartiger Falkner, und die Linie erinnert andere gerne an ihr Erbe.
foreignData.name: Aufscheuern
foreignData.text:
Bestimme eines —
• Aufscheuern fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.
• Zerstöre ein Artefakt deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: Il progenitore Falkenrath era un feroce falconiere e i suoi discendenti non perdono occasione di ricordarlo a chiunque.
foreignData.name: Abrasione
foreignData.text:
Scegli uno —
• L'Abrasione infligge 3 danni a una creatura bersaglio.
• Distruggi un artefatto bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: ファルケンラスの始祖は獰猛な鷹匠であり、その子孫は事あるごとに自身の血筋を自慢する。
foreignData.name: 削剥
foreignData.text:
以下から１つを選ぶ。
• クリーチャー１体を対象とする。削剥はそれに３点のダメージを与える。
• アーティファクト１つを対象とする。それを破壊する。

foreignData.flavorText: 팔켄라스의 시조는 악랄한 매사냥꾼이었고, 그 혈통은 다른 이들에게 자신들의 유산을 빠르게 상기시켜 준다.
foreignData.name: 마멸
foreignData.text:
하나를 선택한다 —
• 생물을 목표로 정한다. 마멸은 그 생물에게 피해 3점을 입힌다.
• 마법물체를 목표로 정한다. 그 마법물체를 파괴한다.

foreignData.flavorText: O progenitor dos Falkenrath era um falcoeiro feroz e sua linhagem não hesita em lembrar essa tradição a todos.
foreignData.name: Abrasão
foreignData.text:
Escolha um —
• Abrasão causa 3 pontos de dano à criatura alvo.
• Destrua o artefato alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Родоначальник Фалькенратов был заядлым сокольником, и вампиры его рода всегда готовы напомнить другим о своем наследии.
foreignData.name: Истирание
foreignData.text:
Выберите одно —
• Истирание наносит 3 повреждения целевому существу.
• Уничтожьте целевой артефакт.

foreignData.flavorText: El progenitor Falkenrath era un halconero violento y su dinastía tarda muy poco en recordar a los demás sus orígenes.
foreignData.name: Erosionar
foreignData.text:
Elige uno:
• Erosionar hace 3 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo.
• Destruye el artefacto objetivo.

sideBoard.name: Abrade
sideBoard.originalText:
Choose one —
• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Destroy target artifact.
sideBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Destroy target artifact.

foreignData.name: 冷酷血涌法师
foreignData.text:
当冷酷血涌法师进战场时，选择一项～
•派出一个1/1，黑绿双色的害虫衍生生物，且具有「当此生物死去时，你获得1点生命。」
•你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。
•放逐目标牌手的坟墓场。
foreignData.type: 生物 — 吸血鬼／邪术师

foreignData.name: 冷酷血湧法師
foreignData.text:
當冷酷血湧法師進戰場時，選擇一項～
•派出一個1/1，黑綠雙色的害蟲衍生生物，且具有「當此生物死去時，你獲得1點生命。」
•你抽一張牌且失去1點生命。
•放逐目標玩家的墳墓場。
foreignData.type: 生物 — 吸血鬼／邪術師

foreignData.name: Sangramage inhumain
foreignData.text:
Quand le Sangramage inhumain arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez l'un —
• Créez un jeton de créature 1/1 noire et verte Parasite avec « Quand cette créature meurt, vous gagnez 1 point de vie ».
• Vous piochez une carte et vous perdez 1 point de vie.
• Exilez le cimetière d'un joueur ciblé.

foreignData.name: Ruchloser Blutmagier
foreignData.text:
Wenn der Ruchlose Blutmagier ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eines —
• Erzeuge einen 1/1 schwarzen und grünen Schädling-Kreaturenspielstein mit „Wenn diese Kreatur stirbt, erhältst du 1 Lebenspunkt dazu."
• Du ziehst eine Karte und verlierst 1 Lebenspunkt.
• Schicke den Friedhof eines Spielers deiner Wahl ins Exil.

foreignData.name: Mago del Sangue Spietato
foreignData.text:
Quando il Mago del Sangue Spietato entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli uno —
• Crea una pedina creatura Peste 1/1 nera e verde con "Quando questa creatura muore, guadagni 1 punto vita".
• Pesca una carta e perdi 1 punto vita.
• Esilia il cimitero di un avversario bersaglio.

foreignData.name: 無神経な血魔道士
foreignData.text:
無神経な血魔道士が戦場に出たとき、以下から１つを選ぶ。
• 「このクリーチャーが死亡したとき、あなたは１点のライフを得る。」を持つ黒緑の１/１の邪魔者・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。
• あなたはカード１枚を引き、１点のライフを失う。
• プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーの墓地を追放する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 吸血鬼・邪術師

foreignData.name: 냉담한 혈마도사
foreignData.text:
냉담한 혈마도사가 전장에 들어올 때, 하나를 선택한다 —
• "이 생물이 죽을 때, 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다."를 가진 1/1 흑색 및 녹색 해충 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
• 당신은 카드 한 장을 뽑고 생명 1점을 잃는다.
• 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어의 무덤을 추방한다.

foreignData.name: Sanguinomante Desapiedado
foreignData.text:
Quando Sanguinomante Desapiedado entrar no campo de batalha, escolha um —
• Crie uma ficha de criatura Peste preta e verde 1/1 com "Quando esta criatura morre, você ganha 1 ponto de vida".
• Você compra um card e perde 1 ponto de vida.
• Exile o cemitério do jogador alvo.

foreignData.name: Жестокосердный Маг Крови
foreignData.text:
Когда Жестокосердный Маг Крови выходит на поле битвы, выберите одно —
• Создайте одну фишку существа 1/1 черный и зеленый Вредитель со способностью «Когда это существо умирает, вы получаете 1 жизнь».
• Вы берете карту и теряете 1 жизнь.
• Изгоните кладбище целевого игрока.

foreignData.name: Magosangre despiadado
foreignData.text:
Cuando el Magosangre despiadado entre al campo de batalla, elige uno:
• Crea una ficha de criatura Plaga negra y verde 1/1 con "Cuando esta criatura muera, ganas 1 vida".
• Robas una carta y pierdes 1 vida.
• Exilia el cementerio del jugador objetivo.

sideBoard.name: Callous Bloodmage
sideBoard.originalText:
When Callous Bloodmage enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
• Exile target player's graveyard.
sideBoard.text:
When this creature enters, choose one —
• Create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this token dies, you gain 1 life."
• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
• Exile target player's graveyard.

foreignData.name: 邪气伴娘安姬
foreignData.text:
每当邪气伴娘安姬和／或一个或数个其他吸血鬼在你的操控下进战场时，派出一个血滴衍生物。此异能每回合只会触发一次。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）
{2}，牺牲另一个生物或一个血滴衍生物：每位对手各失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。

foreignData.name: 邪氣伴娘安姬
foreignData.text:
每當邪氣伴娘安姬和／或一個或數個其他吸血鬼在你的操控下進戰場時，派出一個血滴衍生物。此異能每回合只會觸發一次。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，棄一張牌，犧牲此神器：抽一張牌」的神器。）
{2}，犧牲另一個生物或一個血滴衍生物：每位對手各失去2點生命且你獲得2點生命。

foreignData.name: Anje, demoiselle de déshonneur
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois qu'Anje, demoiselle de déshonneur et/ou au moins un autre vampire arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, créez un jeton Sang. Cette capacité ne se déclenche qu'une seule fois par tour. (C'est un artefact avec « {1}, {T}, défaussez-vous d'une carte, sacrifiez cet artefact : Piochez une carte. »)
{2}, sacrifiez une autre créature ou un jeton Sang : Chaque adversaire perd 2 points de vie et vous gagnez 2 points de vie.

foreignData.name: Anja die Dräuzeugin
foreignData.text:
Immer wenn Anja die Dräuzeugin und/oder ein oder mehrere andere Vampire unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommen, erzeuge einen Blut-Spielstein. Diese Fähigkeit wird nur einmal pro Zug ausgelöst. (Er ist ein Artefakt mit „{1}, {T}, wirf eine Karte ab, opfere dieses Artefakt: Ziehe eine Karte.")
{2}, opfere eine andere Kreatur oder einen Blut-Spielstein: Jeder Gegner verliert 2 Lebenspunkte und du erhältst 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.name: Anje, Damigella di Disonore
foreignData.text:
Ogniqualvolta Anje, Damigella di Disonore e/o uno o più altri Vampiri entrano nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, crea una pedina Sangue. Questa abilità si innesca solo una volta per turno. (È un artefatto con "{1}, {T}, Scarta una carta, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Pesca una carta".)
{2}, Sacrifica un'altra creatura o una pedina Sangue: Ogni avversario perde 2 punti vita e tu guadagni 2 punti vita.

foreignData.name: 面汚しの乙女、エインジー
foreignData.text:
面汚しの乙女、エインジーか、これでない１体以上の吸血鬼があなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、血・トークン１つを生成する。この能力は、毎ターン１回しか誘発しない。（それは「{1}, {T}, カード１枚を捨てる, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：カード１枚を引く。」を持つアーティファクトである。）
{2}, これでないクリーチャー１体か血・トークン１つを生け贄に捧げる：各対戦相手はそれぞれ２点のライフを失い、あなたは２点のライフを得る。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 吸血鬼

foreignData.name: 불명예의 여인, 안지
foreignData.text:
불명예의 여인, 안지 및/또는 다른 흡혈귀가 한 개 이상 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 혈액 토큰 한 개를 만든다. 이 능력은 한 턴에 한 번만 격발한다. (혈액 토큰은 "{1}, {T}, 카드 한 장을 버린다, 이 마법물체를 희생한다: 카드 한 장을 뽑는다."를 가진 마법물체이다.)
{2}, 다른 생물 또는 혈액 토큰 한 개를 희생한다: 각 상대는 생명 2점을 잃고 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다.

foreignData.name: Anje, Dama de Desonra
foreignData.text:
Toda vez que Anje, Dama de Desonra, e/ou um ou mais outros Vampiros entrarem no campo de batalha sob seu controle, crie uma ficha de Sangue. Esta habilidade é desencadeada apenas uma vez a cada turno. (Ela é um artefato com "{1}, {T}, descarte um card, sacrifique este artefato: Compre um card".)
{2}, sacrifique outra criatura ou uma ficha de Sangue: Cada oponente perde 2 pontos de vida e você ganha 2 pontos de vida.

foreignData.name: Анже, Нечестивая Подружка
foreignData.text:
Каждый раз, когда Анже, Нечестивая Подружка и/или один или несколько других Вампиров выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, создайте одну фишку Крови. Эта способность срабатывает только один раз в каждом ходу. (Это артефакт со способностью «{1}, {T}, сбросьте карту, пожертвуйте этот артефакт: возьмите карту».)
{2}, пожертвуйте другое существо или фишку Крови: каждый оппонент теряет 2 жизни, а вы получаете 2 жизни.

foreignData.name: Anje, dama de deshonor
foreignData.text:
Siempre que Anje, dama de deshonor y/o uno o más otros Vampiros entren al campo de batalla bajo tu control, crea una ficha de Sangre. Esta habilidad solo se dispara una vez por turno. (Es un artefacto con "{1}, {T}, descartar una carta, sacrificar este artefacto: Roba una carta".)
{2}, sacrificar otra criatura o una ficha de Sangre: Cada oponente pierde 2 vidas y tú ganas 2 vidas.

sideBoard.name: Anje, Maid of Dishonor
sideBoard.originalText:
Whenever Anje, Maid of Dishonor and/or one or more other Vampires enter the battlefield under your control, create a Blood token. This ability triggers only once each turn. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
{2}, Sacrifice another creature or a Blood token: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

rulings.text: If Anje, Maid of Dishonor and some number of other Vampires enter the battlefield under your control at the same time, you create only one Blood token.
If an effect refers to a Blood token, it means any artifact token with the subtype Blood, even if it has gained other subtypes.
Some triggered abilities trigger "whenever you sacrifice a Blood token." These abilities trigger regardless of why you sacrificed that Blood token.
You can't sacrifice a Blood token to pay multiple costs.

sideBoard.text:
Whenever Anje and/or one or more other Vampires you control enter, create a Blood token. This ability triggers only once each turn. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.")
{2}, Sacrifice another creature or a Blood token: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
